DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the safety and efficacy of inhaled Iloprost (Ventavis®) among adult Chinese patients with primary pulmonary hypertension, which is in compliance with Chinese SFDA regulation.
DOC.brief_title: Post-Marketing Surveillance of Ventavis® in Chinese Patients With Primary Pulmonary Hypertension (PPH)
DOC.criteria: Both male and female age 1865 years old The treating physician has chosen Ventavis as a suitable longterm treatment for the patient Patient with Primary Pulmonary Hypertension (i.e. IPAH or FPAH) and classified as NYHA functional class III Written informed/data protection consent No prior treatment with Ventavis or other active treatments for PPH within 6 weeks of date of study. Known or newly identified contraindication for administration of Ventavis as stated in the Ventavis product package insert.
